languages.text: {n}Вы слышите рядом тихий вдох. Скосив глаза, замечаете веер темных волос. Джай, устроившаяся подле вас, спит прямо в одежде — как и вы. Или не спит.{/n} "Шерин... Вы знаете толк в веселье".

{n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите рядом тихий вдох. Скосив глаза, замечаете веер темных волос. Джай, устроившаяся подле вас, спит прямо в одежде — как и вы. Или не спит.{/n} "Шерин... Вы знаете толк в веселье".

languages.text: {n}你听到身旁传来了一声轻柔的叹息。你循声望去，看到了散落在枕头上的黑发。婕伊躺在你身边，和你一样和衣而眠。又或许，她其实并没有在睡觉。{/n}“亲爱的……你可真会享受甜蜜时光。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到身旁传来了一声轻柔的叹息。你循声望去，看到了散落在枕头上的黑发。婕伊躺在你身边，和你一样和衣而眠。又或许，她其实并没有在睡觉。{/n}“亲爱的……你可真会享受甜蜜时光。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}かたわらで柔らかいため息が聞こえる。ふと見ると、黒い髪が枕の上に広がっている。あなたの隣でぐっすり眠っているジェイは、あなたと同じように服を着ている。あるいは、彼女は眠っていないのかもしれない。{/n}「シャリーン…あんた、楽しい時間の過ごし方をよく知ってるんだね」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}かたわらで柔らかいため息が聞こえる。ふと見ると、黒い髪が枕の上に広がっている。あなたの隣でぐっすり眠っているジェイは、あなたと同じように服を着ている。あるいは、彼女は眠っていないのかもしれない。{/n}「シャリーン…あんた、楽しい時間の過ごし方をよく知ってるんだね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Oyes un suave suspiro a tu lado. Te giras y ves tu almohada cubierta de pelo oscuro, Jae, acurrucada a tu lado, está completamente vestida, igual que tú. Y parece que no está dormida.{/n} «Shereen... Desde luego sabe pasar un buen rato».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un suave suspiro a tu lado. Te giras y ves tu almohada cubierta de pelo oscuro, Jae, acurrucada a tu lado, está completamente vestida, igual que tú. Y parece que no está dormida.{/n} «Shereen... Desde luego sabe pasar un buen rato».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un léger soupir à vos côtés. Vous tournez la tête et découvrez des cheveux noirs étalés en éventail sur votre oreiller. Jae, pelotonnée contre vous, dort à poings fermés. Elle porte encore tous ses vêtements, tout comme vous, mais est-elle réellement endormie ?{/n} « Eh bien, shereen... On peut dire que vous savez vous amuser. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un léger soupir à vos côtés. Vous tournez la tête et découvrez des cheveux noirs étalés en éventail sur votre oreiller. Jae, pelotonnée contre vous, dort à poings fermés. Elle porte encore tous ses vêtements, tout comme vous, mais est-elle réellement endormie ?{/n} « Eh bien, shereen... On peut dire que vous savez vous amuser. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Neben dir vernimmst du ein leises Seufzen. Du drehst dich um und erblickst dunkles Haar, das über dein Kissen verteilt ist. Jae, die sich gemütlich an dir anlehnt und fest schläft, hat noch ihre ganzen Sachen an – genau wie du. Vielleicht schläft sie aber auch gar nicht.{/n} "Shereen ... Ihr wisst auf jeden Fall, wie man sich amüsiert."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben dir vernimmst du ein leises Seufzen. Du drehst dich um und erblickst dunkles Haar, das über dein Kissen verteilt ist. Jae, die sich gemütlich an dir anlehnt und fest schläft, hat noch ihre ganzen Sachen an – genau wie du. Vielleicht schläft sie aber auch gar nicht.{/n} "Shereen ... Ihr wisst auf jeden Fall, wie man sich amüsiert."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yanında yumuşak bir nefes duyuyorsun. O tarafa baktığında, yastığına dağılmış karanlık saçlar görüyorsun. Yanına sokulmuş olan Jae; senin gibi tamamen giyinik hâlde, derin derin uyuyor. Uyumuyor da olabilir.{/n} "Şirinim... Güzel vakit geçirmeyi kesinlikle biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a soft sigh beside you. Looking over, you see dark hair fanned out across your pillow. Jae, who is cosied up next to you fast asleep, is fully dressed — just as you are. Or perhaps she is not asleep at all.{/n} "Shereen... You certainly know how to have a good time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanında yumuşak bir nefes duyuyorsun. O tarafa baktığında, yastığına dağılmış karanlık saçlar görüyorsun. Yanına sokulmuş Jae derin derin uyuyor. Tamamen giyinik hâlde. Tıpkı senin gibi. Ya da uyumuyor da olabilir.{/n} "Şirinim. Güzel zaman geçirmeyi kesinlikle biliyorsun."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
